body.bibl: Salmon ben Yeroham. Asceticism, Eschatology, Opposition to Philosophy: The Arabic Translation and Commentary of Salmon Ben Yeroham on Qohelet (Ecclesiastes). Edited by James T. Robinson. Etudes Sur Le Judaïsme Médiéval; Karaite Texts and Studies 45; 5. Leiden: Brill, 2012.
